MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG6 postcode area of Kirkcudbright. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:25pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded conductor near Culcaigrie and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:25pm on Friday 2nd April 2021.
